Interface UserService

public interface UserService

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addUser(UserDto userDto)

  • Method Details

    • getUserByUsername

      UserDto getUserByUsername(String username) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Retrieve a user by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - the name which uniquely identifies the user
      Returns:
      the existing user's information
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - when no user is found with the given username

    • addUser

      void addUser(UserDto userDto) throws InvalidDataException, DuplicateDataException
      Add a new user.
      Parameters:
      userDto - contains all the relevant user related information.
      Throws:
      InvalidDataException - when either the username or the password is missing or invalid
      DuplicateDataException - when the username is already taken
